'''Telling It How It Is''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Snezhnaya Does Not Believe in Tears: Series I]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to ask about the Fatui, Delusions, and the Tsaritsa in the commission "[[Tales of Winter]]."

==Notes==
* Duplicate options are still available on repeat attempts, so the player should keep in mind which option(s) they previously chose.
